backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that defines BarGraphData and TableData types and provides query functions to fetch mock bar graph and table data, repeating a single hardcoded dataset based on the requested figure count.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two styling features: updating bar graph and table visualizations to match SPSS output aesthetics with minimalist design, thin borders, and muted colors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the main app structure, form validation, SPSS-styled visualizations, React Query hooks, and design system configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes, defining a neutral grayscale palette with chart colors and sidebar theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the RDXper application that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that manages research topic submission, figure count state, and orchestrates rendering of bar graph and table visualizations with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/BarGraphVisualiz: React component that renders bar charts using Recharts with SPSS-style aesthetics including Arial font, muted colors (#4472C4, #70AD47), thin gridlines, and no rounded corners or shadows.
frontend/src/components/ResearchTopicFor: Form component with validation for research topic input and figure count (1-100), displaying error messages and triggering data generation on submit.
frontend/src/components/TableVisualizati: React component that renders tabular data with SPSS-style formatting including thin borders, Arial font, subtle gray headers, right-aligned numeric values, and a summary statistics card.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor for backend communication, using Internet Identity and React Query with automatic invalidation of dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching bar graph and table data from the backend actor, both accepting research topic and figure count parameters.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, earthy color palette for light and dark modes, designed for a data-focused aesthetic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, custom shadows, fonts, and animations for the design system.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing RDXper as a research data visualization web app that generates SPSS-styled bar graphs and tables from user-entered research topics and figure counts, with a warm earthy color palette avoiding blue and purple.
